duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide primary care to adult patients in an outpatient setting.
Conduct infrequent phone calls to maintain work-life balance.
Collaborate with Behavioral Health, High Risk Nurse Care Managers, and Social Workers to provide comprehensive care for patients.
Utilize EPIC with Dragon, HIPAA-compliant texting, patient self-scheduling, and patient portal for efficient operations.
Participate in mentorship and orientation programs for newly hired providers and those new to practice.

education_certification.credential: Unrestricted State of Connecticut medical license (or eligible) and BC/BE Internal or Family Medicine certification
